# selectionAccessoryOffset

**Instance Property**

An offset that changes the selection accessory’s default anchor point.

## Declaration

```swift
get selectionAccessoryOffset(): DOMPoint | undefined;
set selectionAccessoryOffset(value: DOMPoint | undefined);
```

## Managing selection accessories

- **selectionAccessory**: An accessory that displays place information when a person selects a place.
